output.sentences: The lines for the graduation were out the door with excited graduates.
Despite that, my male friend said that his graduation was the happiest day of his life.
He loved going on stage to receive his diploma.
He, I and all of our friends celebrated.
But the happiest person at the whole graduation was his mother - she was so proud of her son!
